Title: Building Enterprise-ready CI/CD Pipelines using Agentic AI
Abstract: This talk explores how agentic AI can be applied to build enterprise-ready CI/CD pipelines that are faster, safer, and easier to operate at scale. Chinmay will walk through how autonomous agents can make decisions across build, test, and deployment workflows, reducing manual intervention while improving reliability and governance. Attendees will gain a practical view of how AI-driven automation fits into modern CI/CD platforms and what it takes to move from experimental pipelines to production-grade delivery systems.

Title: AgentCast: Autonomous AI-Driven Time Series Forecasting for DevOps at Scale
Abstract: Watch AI completely automate time series forecasting! Live demos: capacity planning, performance monitoring, predictive maintenance - zero ML expertise required. The future of autonomous DevOps operations is here

Title: AI-Driven Workflow Orchestration: Automating DevOps at Enterprise Scale
Abstract: Stop fighting fires after they start. Learn how intelligent workflow orchestration predicts and prevents production incidents, automates incident response, and lets your DevOps team focus on innovation instead of toil. Real architecture from enterprise deployments.

Title: From Demo to Deployment: Building, Evaluating, and Observing Multimodal Conversational Agents
Abstract: Multimodal AI is leaving the demo stage. Learn how production ready voice, vision, and touch agents deliver 37% higher task success, and how DevOps teams design, deploy, observe, and scale these systems with real world architectures and metrics.

JobTitle1: Senior Staff Software Engineer - Product Software
Title: From Reactive IaC to Autonomous Cloud Engineering: LLM-Driven Multi-Cloud Infrastructure for 2026 and Beyond
Abstract: Unlock the future of DevOps with autonomous LLM-driven cloud systems. Learn how AI agents gain real-time infrastructure awareness, prevent misconfigurations, and orchestrate multi-cloud environments—faster, safer, and smarter than ever before.

Title: AI Agents for Incident Response: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
Abstract: AI agents are joining your on-call team - but can you trust them? This talk exposes where they supercharge incident response, where they cause chaos, and how to use them safely with tools like MCP. Real lessons, no AI hype.

Title: GenOps: A Governance-Driven Model for Safe, High-Velocity AI in CI/CD Pipelines
Abstract: Want AI-powered automation without AI-powered outages? GenOps introduces a governance-first model that lets generative agents act inside CI/CD pipelines safely, predictably, and fast. Discover how teams cut cycle time while staying fully compliant.

JobTitle1: Principal Member of Technical Staff [Oracle Cloud Infrastructure]
Title: Zero-Downtime by Design: High-Availability Migration Patterns for Modern Gateway & Platform Engineering
Abstract: A real-world zero-downtime gateway migration powered by shadow traffic, automated pipelines, microservice extraction, and phased rollouts. Learn how to modernize critical systems without breaking production and achieve scalable, resilient platform architecture.

Title: Scaling Microservices Development: A Shared-Cluster Deployment Platform for Faster, Cost-Efficient SaaS Delivery
Abstract: Discover how a shared-cluster deployment platform slashes testing time, cuts infrastructure costs, and accelerates microservices delivery without sacrificing security or isolation.

Title: Scaling APIs to Billions: Architectures and Algorithms for Extreme-Scale Reliability
Abstract: Learn how the world’s top platforms handle billions of API requests daily. This talk reveals real-world architectures, scaling algorithms, and chaos-tested strategies to keep your systems fast, resilient, and cost-efficient at massive scale.

Title: From Lift-and-Shift to Kubernetes: A Two-Phase DevOps Modernization
Abstract: A battle-tested DevOps story: move a high-volume ticketing monolith from VMware/Oracle to GCE, then rebuild cloud-native on GKE + PostgreSQL—zero downtime tactics, dependency mapping, replication, Kubernetes security policies, and multi-region DR lessons.

Title: Infrastructure as Code for Enterprise Networks: Automating SD-WAN and Zero Trust
Abstract: Stop treating networks like snowflakes! Learn how to apply GitOps and IaC to enterprise networking with SD-WAN automation, zero trust segmentation, and CI/CD pipelines for network changes. Real-world patterns for DevOps teams ready to automate their network infrastructure.

Title: Automating Continuous Compliance for Scalable and Sustainable SaaS Delivery
Abstract: Discover how automation-driven compliance powers resilient, scalable, and energy-efficient SaaS delivery. Learn practical frameworks that boost uptime, cut engineering waste, and turn DevOps compliance into a strategic advantage not a bottleneck.

Title: Privacy by Design for DevOps: Building Scalable, Secure, Regulation-Ready Data Systems
Abstract: Learn how to embed Privacy by Design into DevOps pipelines using real-world techniques differential privacy, anonymization, homomorphic encryption to build scalable, secure, regulation-ready data systems without slowing innovation.

Title: Cloud-Driven Compliance and Analytics for Scalable Provider Network Governance
Abstract: Discover how cloud-native compliance systems and analytics-driven DevOps pipelines can transform provider network governance cutting costs, reducing audit risk, and boosting accuracy. Learn actionable strategies to build scalable, resilient health insurance systems.

Title: The AI Trust Triad for DevOps: Shipping Reinforcement Learning, Federated Learning, and Explainable AI Safely in Regulated Systems
Abstract: AI in production is hard. Learn how DevOps teams can safely ship Reinforcement Learning, Federated Learning, and Explainable AI in regulated finance and supply chains using real-world pipelines for trust, privacy, observability, and continuous delivery.

Title: Real-Time FinOps Intelligence: Template-Driven Prompt Engineering for Streaming Financial Events
Abstract: Turn millions of financial events/sec into instant, auditable ops decisions. Learn battle-tested prompt templates that fuse streams + observability into structured outputs for triage, anomaly detection, and schema-drift recovery, boosting accuracy 10–15 points and accelerating DevOps automation.

Title: Designing a Read-Intensive Architecture for Information Systems with High Data Throughput
Abstract: Building high-load systems isn’t just adding resources. Efficient storage, caching, and network optimization are key, while well-designed data schemes and architectural decisions ensure performance and SLA compliance at scale.

Title: Observing Agentic/MCP Traffic & Keeping Costs Low
Abstract: Agentic Workloads and MCP is at the forefront of every engineering organization in the cloud-native realm. That's why there are two major questions coming up. 1). How can we observe metrics. 2) How can we control posts. In this session, you'll learn how to produce Agentic and MCP traffic

Title: AI Subscription Platforms in DevOps: Transforming Delivery Models & Operations
Abstract: Explore how AI subscription platforms are revolutionizing DevOps practices with 37% higher accuracy through continuous delivery, 31% cost reduction, and 61% faster deployment. Learn practical frameworks for implementation while navigating data quality and privacy challenges.

JobTitle1: Senior Consultant, Manager, Cognizant Business Consulting
Title: DevOps Pipelines for Clinical AI: Deploying Real-Time Sepsis Detection at Scale
Abstract: Deploy AI that saves lives. Learn how DevOps practices power real-time sepsis detection in production healthcare environments. Kubernetes, observability, and CI/CD patterns for mission-critical ML systems where downtime means mortality. Healthcare DevOps challenges mirror fintech complexity.

Title: Operationalizing Predictive Analytics in Education: MLOps Strategies for Scalable, Ethical Student Success
Abstract: Learn how DevOps and MLOps turn predictive analytics into scalable, ethical systems that improve student success. From ML pipelines to model monitoring, discover how data-driven education works in production.

Title: AI Driven Vectorized Motor Health Monitoring for Reliable Industrial Operations
Abstract: AI meets industrial reliability. Learn how vectorized motor health data turns raw sensor signals into predictive insights, enabling early fault detection, smarter maintenance, and higher uptime through DevOps aligned observability and AI driven analytics.

Title: Real-Time Embedded AI for Deterministic, Adaptive, and Sustainable Robotics
Abstract: Robots need fast, efficient, and reliable AI especially on edge hardware. This talk reveals a practical framework that unifies sensor fusion, lightweight inference, and deterministic actuation to achieve millisecond accuracy and long-duration autonomy.

Title: Human–AI Collaboration for Reliable Embedded Automotive Control Systems
Abstract: Discover how human–AI collaboration transforms embedded automotive control systems. Learn how shared intelligence, multimodal sensing, and real-time decision-making boost safety, reliability, and trust shaping the next generation of adaptive, human-centered mobility.

Title: Building Robust GPU Performance Validation into CI/CD Pipelines for AI Infrastructure
Abstract: Stop discovering GPU performance issues in production. Learn to embed systematic validation into your CI/CD pipelines, catching compute and memory bottlenecks before deployment. Real metrics, automated gates, and platform engineering strategies for AI infrastructure.

Title: Context Engineering for DevOps: Turning Your Infrastructure into a Reasoning Graph
Abstract: LLMs fail at infrastructure because they can't capture live dependencies or multi-hop relationships. This talk shows how to treat infrastructure as a graph so AI systems can reason instead of guess. Learn Graph RAG, natural language to Cypher querying, and how to measure context quality.

Title: Building Self-Healing CI/CD Pipelines with Tekton and ArgoCD: A GitOps-native Approach to Resilience
Abstract: Discover how to architect resilient CI/CD pipelines using Tekton and ArgoCD. This session presents a GitOps-native approach to self-healing deployments combining observability, automation, and AI to drive reliability at scale across modern Kubernetes platforms.

Title: Observability as a Platform Contract: Zero-Code Instrumentation and CI/CD-Enforced SLOs
Abstract: Stop treating observability as optional tooling. Learn how to build platform contracts that enforce zero-code instrumentation and CI/CD-gated SLOs—so every service ships with traces, metrics, and reliability guarantees baked in. Practical patterns from finance, logistics, and retail environments.

Title: Predictive Observability: Prevent Supply Chain Outages Before They Break Your Production
Abstract: Stop waking up at 3 AM to production fires you could've prevented. Learn how predictive analytics + real-time observability detects supply chain disruptions hours before they crash your systems. Real architectures, real results, practical DevOps patterns you can implement Monday.

Title: AI-Powered Reliability: Stop Fighting Fires, Start Preventing Them
Abstract: Transform your DevOps from firefighting to fire prevention. Discover how AI/ML reduce MTTR by 40-60%, predict failures before they happen, and automate incident resolution—so your team can focus on shipping, not scrambling. Real-world insights from teams already winning.

Title: From Signal to Insight: Building Queryable Observability with the Model Context Protocol
Abstract: Drowning in logs, metrics, and traces? Learn how to build structured, queryable observability using MCP, which is an open protocol that embeds context directly into telemetry. We'll walk through a practical architecture that cut our MTTD by 40% and reduced alert fatigue.

Title: Security and Accessibility can be friends!
Abstract: Many a security expert has been told that security may be compromised due to accessibility needs. Many an accessibility expert has been told accessibility must be reduced to allow for security. Gian Wild is here to tell you that they are wrong.

Title: ML-Driven IP Detection at Scale: CI/CD Meets Cloud-Native Enforcement
Abstract: Building production-grade IP enforcement systems at scale requires more than ML—it demands battle-tested DevOps. Learn event-driven architectures, observable pipelines, and cloud-native practices that catch violations in real-time while keeping your team sane.

Title: Green Checkmarks, Red Flags: What CI/CD Can't Catch
Abstract: You rely on CI/CD, but passing tests don't guarantee quality. Drawing from open source at scale and incidents like XZ Utils, learn what automation misses and how to design review practices and cultural safeguards that work alongside your pipelines.

Title: Building Security Into Your DevOps Pipeline: How NGFWs Protect AI Workloads Without Slowing You Down
Abstract: Tired of security slowing down your AI deployments? Learn how teams use NGFWs to protect ML workloads without blocking releases. Real production stories, automation strategies, and solutions for quantum encryption challenges. No theory, just what actually works in DevOps pipelines.

Title: Defender XDR in the Real World: From Alert Fatigue to Measurable Risk Reduction
Abstract: Real-world Defender XDR playbook that turns alert storms into actionable incidents, applies safe automations to triage and contain, and cuts MTTR. Clear guidance on tuning built-ins vs custom detections and a simple metric pack to prove risk reduction.

Title: Zero-Trust Security in DevOps: Automating Trust Verification Across 5G Pipelines
Abstract: Transform DevOps pipelines into self-defending systems with zero-trust security and AI-driven threat detection. Learn practical frameworks for continuous authentication, automated threat response, and embedding security into every CI/CD stage—without sacrificing deployment speed.

Title: Guardrails First: Designing Safe, Scalable, and Accountable AI Agents for Security Operations
Abstract: Discover how to build trustworthy AI agents for your SOC with a “Guardrails First” approach—boosting triage speed and accuracy without sacrificing safety, compliance, or human control.

Company1: Senior Member, IEEE – Southeastern Michigan Section (SEM), Lead Engineer, Cornerstone Building Brands, USA
Title: Shift Left, Shield Right: A DevSecOps Playbook for AI-Era CI/CD Pipelines
Abstract: AI-driven development changes your pipeline attack surface. This talk shows a practical blueprint for securing CI/CD—from code to containers—without slowing delivery. Real threats, real patterns, real fixes that DevOps teams can apply immediately.

Title: SRE for Supply Chain: Building Reliable Human-AI Warehouse Operations at Scale
Abstract: Supply chain systems are production systems. Discover how SRE principles, observability patterns, and platform engineering create predictable, self-healing warehouse operations where AI and human workers collaborate effectively at scale.

Title: The Multi‑Workload Challenge: Predictable Failover Across the Stack
Abstract: Outages happen. At Intuit, a Kubernetes-native platform makes region failover boring: services declaratively onboard; we pre-scale from live traffic, promote standby DBs, and shift routes via Route53/Istio—slashing recovery time and standardizing resilience for hundreds of microservices.

Title: How AI is redefining SRE and Customer Experience
Abstract: AI is reshaping SRE, but the real opportunity isn’t faster RCA, it’s building proactive, customer-centered reliability. This talk explores how AI and culture together move us from firefighting to foresight.

Title: Keeping High-Traffic Systems Running When Things Go Wrong
Abstract: Outages don’t start with chaos. They start quietly. I’ll share hard-earned lessons from running high-traffic systems, what actually breaks in production, and how teams keep services reliable under real-world pressure.

Title: AI-Driven Threat Screening for 5G UPF with Automated Risk Mitigation
Abstract: Discover how AI-driven, multi-factor risk scoring and automated mitigation transform 5G UPF security. Learn how real-time behavioral detection and programmable defenses cut alert fatigue, speed incident response, and harden networks against emerging threats.

Title: From Zero to a DevSecOps Hero: Extending Microsoft Sentinel
Abstract: Become a DevSecOps hero with Microsoft Sentinel. Learn how to impress your SecOps colleagues by building custom connectors, analytics rules, and playbooks; enhancing detection and remediation capabilities, and shortening the time required to detect and mitigate attacks.

JobTitle1: Managing Consultant - SAP Transformations and Operations
Title: Generative AI Workflows for Climate Risk Modeling in Food Systems
Abstract: Generative AI can now simulate climate risks, recommend local adaptations, and produce clear briefs for decision-makers. Learn how to integrate these capabilities into scalable DevOps workflows that strengthen climate resilience across food systems.
